incidents.name: Voice Recordings Delays

incident_updates.body: The issue affecting delays in voice recordings has been resolved and the service is functioning normally at this time.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Recording

incident_updates.body: We have started seeing recovery regarding delays in voice recordings. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Recording

incident_updates.body: We are investigating delays in voice recordings. This includes listing and fetching single instances. API requests are taking up to 2 seconds to complete. We expect to provide another update within 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Recording

incident_updates.body: We are investigating delays in voice recordings. This includes listing and fetching single instances. API requests are taking up to 2 seconds to complete. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Recording

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with voice recording. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Recording

incident_updates.body: We have started seeing recovery for the issue causing message delays to a subset of Twilio Israel Phone Numbers has been identified. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Issues Viewing Call Logs, Call Deletes, Pricing for Programmable and Trunking Call

incident_updates.body: We were seeing degraded performance for Programmable Calls for 7 minutes between 01:13 and 01:20 Pacific Time on 01/17/2023. During this period, customers may have experienced issues viewing their call logs / pricing for Programmable and Trunking Calls. The issue has now been resolved.
